title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 494-1.10 - Enforcement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 494-1.10 - Enforcement

State Regulations
(a) Any person who
violates any provision of or who fails to perform any duty imposed by this Part
shall be liable for all applicable penalties or sanctions set forth in article
71 of the Environmental Conservation Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
494-1.10

Adopted

New

York State Register December 24, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 52, eff. 1/9/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
